actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Lea Gelb, Chaim Morris Gelb, and Sidney Gelb.

summary.text: Deems certain numbered claims for property losses of three named individuals to be claims for losses resulting from the nationalization of property by the Government of Czechoslovakia. Provides for the redetermination of such claims by the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission of the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lea Gelb, Chaim Morris Gelb, and Sidney Gelb.
